column3: Latest;Takhmao: A python that a family have kept for around 25 years has died
column4: according to a Facebook account named សេដ្ឋ (Economist).------The post said that the reptile had been with the family since before he was born
column5: and was more than a pet
column6: but part of the family.------The python was given a burial on Sunday 10 November.
